radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the lumbar spine with contrast enhancement
radiographic_examinations.findings: End-plate irregularity and destruction of the L4 and L5 vertebrae, with a surrounding left paravertebral and ventral epidural soft-tissue collection extending into the right foramen. No evidence of nerve-root compression.
Multiple calcified mediastinal and hilar lymph nodes, parenchymal scarring in the right upper lobe, and a trace pleural effusion on the right side.
Multiple calcified mediastinal and hilar lymph nodes.
